bibl.title: Translating Monkeys between Demotic and Greek, or Why a Lynx Is Not Always a Wildcat: (λυκο)λύγξ = (wnš-)kwf.
bibl.note: About the two animal forms assumed by the male protagonist in P. lit. Lond. 192 (= M.-P.3 2618; LDAB 5054), a papyrus bearing a Greek version of a Demotic literary text, the so-called Myth of the Sun's Eye.
bibl.seg: Luigi Prada, Translating Monkeys between Demotic and Greek, or Why a Lynx Is Not Always a Wildcat: (λυκο)λύγξ = (wnš-)kwf.

About the two animal forms assumed by the male protagonist in P. lit. Lond. 192 (= M.-P.3 2618; LDAB 5054), a papyrus bearing a Greek version of a Demotic literary text, the so-called Myth of the Sun's Eye.
